testcase.name: User should be able to search for flights for one way trip
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to MakeMyTrip URL.......................................passed Then User should be able to remove any pop ups on the home page.............passed Then User should be able provide From City input field......................passed And User should be able provide To City input field.........................passed And User should be able to provide departure date...........................passed And User clicks on the search button........................................passed Then User should be landed to search page with flight details...............passed
